Package oracle.ucp.jdbc.oracle

Includes various runtime statistics for the Universal Connection Pool that are specific to Oracle JDBC resources.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
OracleJDBCConnectionPoolStatistics Various runtime statistics for the Universal Connection Pool that are specific to Oracle JDBC resources.
 

Package oracle.ucp.jdbc.oracle Description

Includes various runtime statistics for the Universal Connection Pool that are specific to Oracle JDBC resources.

The OracleJDBCConnectionPoolStatistics interface provides query-only operations on all available pool statistics.

Related Documentation

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, see:
  • Oracle Universal Connection Pool for JDBC Developer's Guide
